ValidationRule.description: Ensures email format contains @ and dot
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(ISBLANK(Email__c)), OR( NOT(CONTAINS(Email__c, "@")), NOT(CONTAINS(Email__c, ".")), NOT(CONTAINS(RIGHT(Email__c, LEN(Email__c) - FIND("@", Email__c)), ".")) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter a valid email address with @ and domain
